name: SPACE JUNK (itch) (BishopBit)
description:
A game by BishopBit.

Made with Unity 2020.3. 

Special thanks to:

  • Unity Technologies for the engine, the assets and the Unity Learn course
  • Komiku for the song 'Space MTV'
  • DinV Studio for the asset 'Dynamic Space Background Lite'
  • CGPitbull for the asset 'Free SF Fighter'
  • Infima Games for the asset 'Low Poly Space Rocks'

NOTE: This game was made as a personal project for a limited period of time. The main goal was to improve my Unity knowledge and have a complete launchable game. There is a lot of room for improvement and in the future I would like to add features like persistent score or multiple difficulties.
